title: TinySpell+ v1.9.52
description:
Education Software : TinySpell+ v1.9.52
	
Developer	: KEDMI Scientific Computing
License/Price	: $10.00 USD
Size / OS	: 907 KB / Windows 2K / XP / Vista / 7 / 8
Last Updated	: July 16th, 2014
Trial Limit	: Some functions are disabled

Description:

Alerts you whenever it detects a misspelled word

Occasionally you need to check spelling in an application that does not include a spelling checker and you don't want to launch your word processor just for that. This is when tinySpell becomes handy.

tinySpell+ is an utility that allows users to check and correct easily the spelling in any Windows application.

The tinySpell+ application can watch your typing on the fly and alert you whenever it detects a misspelled word. It can also check the spelling of text that you copy to the clipboard. tinySpell+ installs itself in the system tray for easy access.

What's New in This Release:
[tinySpell+] tinySpell+ supports now Hunspell dictionaries. Hunspell dictionaries are available in many languages; they are free and are used by many popular programs such as OpenOffice, LibreOffice, Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome.
